trans-unit.source: Web Apps overview
trans-unit.target: Web Apps overview

trans-unit.source: Learn more about App Service Web Apps
trans-unit.target: Learn more about App Service Web Apps

trans-unit.source: Web Apps overview
trans-unit.target: Web Apps overview

trans-unit.source: [App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) is a fully Managed Platform for professional developers that brings a rich set of capabilities to web, mobile and integration scenarios.
trans-unit.target: [App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) is a fully Managed Platform for professional developers that brings a rich set of capabilities to web, mobile and integration scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Quickly create and deploy mission critical web apps that scale with your business by using Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: Quickly create and deploy mission critical web apps that scale with your business by using Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: Leverage the power of [App Service Web Apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) to use the languages and frameworks you know and depend on, deploy your applications quickly to the Azure Cloud and continuously improve your code without having to worry about infrastructure ever again.
trans-unit.target: Leverage the power of [App Service Web Apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) to use the languages and frameworks you know and depend on, deploy your applications quickly to the Azure Cloud and continuously improve your code without having to worry about infrastructure ever again.

trans-unit.source: Web Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Web Marketplace

trans-unit.source: More than just websites
trans-unit.target: More than just websites

trans-unit.source: Modern enterprises interact with their customers in ever more sophisticated ways.
trans-unit.target: Modern enterprises interact with their customers in ever more sophisticated ways.

trans-unit.source: Companies of all types regard their corporate Web presence as a critical part of their business, a major component in their business plan.
trans-unit.target: Companies of all types regard their corporate Web presence as a critical part of their business, a major component in their business plan.

trans-unit.source: To accommodate this importance, enterprises are looking for a platform that will provide them with the agility, security and scalability.Furthermore, they require the capability to link to their existing business system, be able to quickly deploy new code and spin up instances across the globe.
trans-unit.target: To accommodate this importance, enterprises are looking for a platform that will provide them with the agility, security and scalability.Furthermore, they require the capability to link to their existing business system, be able to quickly deploy new code and spin up instances across the globe.

trans-unit.source: With Azure App Service and Web Apps, organizations can delight their customers quickly and cost-effectively.
trans-unit.target: With Azure App Service and Web Apps, organizations can delight their customers quickly and cost-effectively.

trans-unit.source: Why Web Apps?
trans-unit.target: Why Web Apps?

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service Web Apps is a fully managed platform that enables you to build, deploy and scale enterprise-grade web apps in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service Web Apps is a fully managed platform that enables you to build, deploy and scale enterprise-grade web apps in seconds.

trans-unit.source: Focus on your application code, and let Azure take care of the infrastructure to scale and securely run it for you.
trans-unit.target: Focus on your application code, and let Azure take care of the infrastructure to scale and securely run it for you.

trans-unit.source: Web Apps is:
trans-unit.target: Web Apps is:

trans-unit.source: **Familiar and Fast** - Use your existing skills to code in your favorite language, framework, and IDE.
trans-unit.target: **Familiar and Fast** - Use your existing skills to code in your favorite language, framework, and IDE.

trans-unit.source: With just a few clicks, add versioning, updating, single sign-on, identity broker, isolated storage, and performance monitoring to your existing web apps.
trans-unit.target: With just a few clicks, add versioning, updating, single sign-on, identity broker, isolated storage, and performance monitoring to your existing web apps.

trans-unit.source: Access a rich gallery to use as building blocks to accelerate your development.
trans-unit.target: Access a rich gallery to use as building blocks to accelerate your development.

trans-unit.source: Experience unparalleled developer productivity with cutting edge capabilities like continuous integration, live-site debugging, and industry leading Visual Studio IDE.
trans-unit.target: Experience unparalleled developer productivity with cutting edge capabilities like continuous integration, live-site debugging, and industry leading Visual Studio IDE.

trans-unit.source: **Enterprise Grade** - Web Apps is designed for building and hosting secure mission-critical applications.
trans-unit.target: **Enterprise Grade** - Web Apps is designed for building and hosting secure mission-critical applications.

trans-unit.source: Build Active Directory integrated business apps that connect securely to on-premises resources, then host them on a secure cloud platform that is ISO, SOC2, and PCI compliant.
trans-unit.target: Build Active Directory integrated business apps that connect securely to on-premises resources, then host them on a secure cloud platform that is ISO, SOC2, and PCI compliant.

trans-unit.source: All while enjoying enterprise level SLAs.
trans-unit.target: All while enjoying enterprise level SLAs.

trans-unit.source: **Global Scale** - Web Apps is optimized to provide availability and automatic scale on a global datacenter infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: **Global Scale** - Web Apps is optimized to provide availability and automatic scale on a global datacenter infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Easily scale applications up or down on demand.
trans-unit.target: Easily scale applications up or down on demand.

trans-unit.source: With high availability provided within and across different geographical regions.
trans-unit.target: With high availability provided within and across different geographical regions.

trans-unit.source: Replicating data and hosting services in multiple locations is quick and easy, making expansion into new regions and geographies as simple as a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: Replicating data and hosting services in multiple locations is quick and easy, making expansion into new regions and geographies as simple as a mouse click.

trans-unit.source: Web Apps Concepts
trans-unit.target: Web Apps Concepts

trans-unit.source: **Web Apps Gallery** - Select from an ever-growing list of existing web application templates.
trans-unit.target: **Web Apps Gallery** - Select from an ever-growing list of existing web application templates.

trans-unit.source: Leverage the best of the OSS app community with one-click installation of packages such as Wordpress, Joomla and Drupal.
trans-unit.target: Leverage the best of the OSS app community with one-click installation of packages such as Wordpress, Joomla and Drupal.

trans-unit.source: Get your application development process start right by leveraging frameworks like .NET MVC, Django and CakePHP.
trans-unit.target: Get your application development process start right by leveraging frameworks like .NET MVC, Django and CakePHP.

trans-unit.source: **Auto Scaling** - Web Apps enables you to quickly scale-up or out to handle any incoming customer load.
trans-unit.target: **Auto Scaling** - Web Apps enables you to quickly scale-up or out to handle any incoming customer load.

trans-unit.source: Manually select the number and size of VMs or set up auto-scaling to scale your servers based on load or schedule.
trans-unit.target: Manually select the number and size of VMs or set up auto-scaling to scale your servers based on load or schedule.

trans-unit.source: **Continuous Integration** - Set up continuous integration and deployment workflows with VSO, GitHub, TeamCity, Hudson or BitBucket – enabling you to automatically build, test and deploy your web app on each successful code check-in or integration tests.
trans-unit.target: **Continuous Integration** - Set up continuous integration and deployment workflows with VSO, GitHub, TeamCity, Hudson or BitBucket – enabling you to automatically build, test and deploy your web app on each successful code check-in or integration tests.

trans-unit.source: **Deployment Slots** - Implement [Staged Deployment] [Slots] to verify your code in a pre-production environment which is identical to your production web app in Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: **Deployment Slots** - Implement [Staged Deployment] [Slots] to verify your code in a pre-production environment which is identical to your production web app in Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: When satisfied, release a new version of your App with zero downtime by performing a swap operation.
trans-unit.target: When satisfied, release a new version of your App with zero downtime by performing a swap operation.

trans-unit.source: **Testing in Production** - Take Staged Deployments to the next level and perform A/B testing to verify your new code with a configurable fraction of your live traffic.
trans-unit.target: **Testing in Production** - Take Staged Deployments to the next level and perform A/B testing to verify your new code with a configurable fraction of your live traffic.

trans-unit.source: **Webjobs** - Run any program or script on Web Apps VMs.
trans-unit.target: **Webjobs** - Run any program or script on Web Apps VMs.

trans-unit.source: Run jobs continuously or on a schedule and scale to run on multiple VMs.
trans-unit.target: Run jobs continuously or on a schedule and scale to run on multiple VMs.

trans-unit.source: Use the Azure [WebJobs SDK][Webjobs] to integrate with Azure Storage or Service Bus.
trans-unit.target: Use the Azure [WebJobs SDK][Webjobs] to integrate with Azure Storage or Service Bus.

trans-unit.source: **Hybrid connections** - - Access on-premises data using [hybrid connections](../integration-hybrid-connection-overview.md) and [VNET](../app-service-web/web-sites-integrate-with-vnet.md).
trans-unit.target: **Hybrid connections** - - Access on-premises data using [hybrid connections](../integration-hybrid-connection-overview.md) and [VNET](../app-service-web/web-sites-integrate-with-vnet.md).

trans-unit.source: Getting Started
trans-unit.target: Getting Started

trans-unit.source: To get started with Web Apps, follow the [Create an ASP.NET web app] [create] tutorial.
trans-unit.target: To get started with Web Apps, follow the [Create an ASP.NET web app] [create] tutorial.

trans-unit.source: For more information on Azure App Service platform, see [Azure App Service][appservice].
trans-unit.target: For more information on Azure App Service platform, see [Azure App Service][appservice].

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751), where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751), where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.

trans-unit.source: No credit cards required; no commitments.
trans-unit.target: No credit cards required; no commitments.

trans-unit.source: What's changed
trans-unit.target: What's changed

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: [Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714)
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: [Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714)

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change of the old portal to the new portal see: [Reference for navigating the preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715)
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change of the old portal to the new portal see: [Reference for navigating the preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715)

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
